page.title: 10Piddinghoe Flower Festival
page.content: The bi-annual Flower Festival is held raise funds for St.John's Church Piddinghoe. It is held over the three days of the August Bank Holiday. The church is magnificently decorated with flowers (on a set theme) and also has large set floral pieces. Local artists display their work in the church. The village hall houses an Art and Craft exhibition. Teas are sold in the village gardens and at the church gateway is a large stall selling such things as produce, lavender dolls, egg cosies, plants and flowers. There is a large raffle and the proceedings are wound up on the monday evening with a barbeque for the whole village and the Festival helpers.
